title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: The Launch item should stay on the second row after deleting an item.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the Coolbar.
3. Press the Delete button.
4. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the Launch item is moved to the first row.
5. Verify that the Launch item remains on the second row after the delete operation.
